survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with In-Home Smart Gardening Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used in-home smart gardening systems to understand their satisfaction levels, challenges faced, and potential areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your in-home smart gardening system overall?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

questions.question_text: Which features of your smart gardening system do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify popular features. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.
